String.string: The {@creature:46#7005#grellok spire} shouldn't be hard to dismantle.
Parts of the {@creature:46#7005#grellok spire} are critical to our research.
Dismantle the {@creature:46#7005#grellok spire} in the {@Rgn:46025$$Raga Transmission Room} and collect grellok spire parts.
Return to the {@Rgn:46016$$Mindcrown Chamber} and deliver the grellok spire parts to {@creature:246#1102$$Nevian}.
Deliver the grellok spire parts to {@creature:246#1028$$Rhentar} in the {@Rgn:46021$$Strifecore Chamber}.
